short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays badges in the GitHub repository list of a user.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Badges are a great way to see the current state of a project with some simple images. This extension displays the badges of a project in the repository list of a user, so you do not have to go to the project page.

== Call for help ==
The extension detects badges by matching image urls with known badge urls. If there are badges that this extension does not detect, feel free to create an issue or pull request here:

https://github.com/dword-design/github-repository-list-badges
